name: Cave Dwellers (VERY EARLY BUILD)
description:
A Gnome Needs To Find His Way Out Of A Collapsing Cave, While Collecting As Many Shiny Diamonds As Possible.

Will you make it out? Or will you become a part of a tragedy? Find out soon.

Current Version: (EARLY BUILD) - Pre-Alpha v0.0.0c

Mini Patch Notes:

v0.0.0c - Added Easier Level One, New Textures, Added DEBUG Restarting (Press "R")

Beta Release Planned 10.31.2020

Full Release Planned 11.31.2020
